## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Knowledge

+--------------------------------------------+------------------------+---------------------+------------------------------------+
| **Response pattern**                       | **Example selections** | **Knowledge score** | **Interpretation**                 |
+============================================+========================+=====================+====================================+
| Selected both correct answers only         | HEV + PHEV             | 2                   | Fully knowledgeable                |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------+---------------------+------------------------------------+
| Selected one correct answer only           | HEV (or PHEV)          | 1                   | Partially knowledgeable            |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------+---------------------+------------------------------------+
| Selected a correct answer + “I’m not sure” | HEV + not_sure         | 0.5                 | Some knowledge, but uncertain      |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------+---------------------+------------------------------------+
| Selected only incorrect options            | BEV or not_sure only   | 0                   | No knowledge / misconception       |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------+---------------------+------------------------------------+
| Selected both correct + incorrect          | HEV + BEV              | 1                   | Knowledge mixed with misconception |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------+---------------------+------------------------------------+

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
